text: Manciola is a genus of skinks. It contains one species, Manciola guaporicola, which is found in South America (Brazil, Bolivia, and Paraguay). It is also known as Dunn's mabuya or South American small-handed skink. ==References== Category:Skinks Category:Monotypic lizard genera Category:Taxa named by Stephen Blair Hedges Category:Taxa named by Caitlin E. Conn
title: Manciola
